page.title: 15YOUTH ACTIVITIES IN BUNGAY
page.content: Bungay and Earsham each have their own packs of Brownies,Cubs,Scouts and Venture Scouts. There are three Guide packs in Bungay. The Mayfair is a small cinema in Broad Street, it endeavours to show the latest films. About 500 people in total see each film. Due to local demand, a small record shop has recently opened in Bungay. About 500 people attend every film. A record shop recently opened in Bungay due to local demand. Both Bungay and Earsham have Sunday Schools,and playgroups for pre-school children. The Shell Youth Club attracts about sixty youngsters a week,aged nine to thirteen.
